articles.description: Australia is once again the best team in the world, apparently.
articles.content: Australia has reclaimed the No. 1 spot on the ICC Test rankings for the first time since May 2020, but the accolade raised a few eyebrows.Australia is once again the best team in the world, apparentl… [+4915 chars]

articles.author: AFP and James Matthey
articles.title: Dejected star’s truth bombs in brutal presser - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: A dejected Alexander Zverev labelled his straight sets exit to Denis Shapovalov on Sunday as one of the worst of his career where “everything” went wrong.
articles.content: Alexander Zverev was a pre-tournament favourite but his press conference said it all after bombing out early of yet another grand slam.A dejected Alexander Zverev labelled his straight sets exit to D… [+5048 chars]
